mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (note_id, author_id, parent_id, content, like_count, reply_count) VALUES (#{noteId}, #{authorId}, #{parentId}, #{content}, #{likeCount}, #{replyCount})
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET like_count = like_count + 1 WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
UPDATE comment SET like_count = like_count - 1 WHERE comment_id = #{commentId} AND like_count > 0

UPDATE comment SET reply_count = reply_count - 1 WHERE comment_id = #{commentId} AND reply_count > 0
